JETTQ
Class JETTQManager

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      JETTQ.JETTQManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class JETTQManager
extends java.lang.Thread

Main class of the JETTQ framework. The majority of the SPOT's functionality can be accessed through this. It also holds managers for the LED, Radio, Switch, and Accelerometer components.

Author:
JETTQ [jettq@wpi.edu]
